citation: Proclamation under the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Probationary Licences) Act 2017 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Probationary Licences) Act 2017

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Probationary Licences) Act 2017 fix 1 January 2018 as the day on which that Act commences.

19 December 2017

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

M. T. (RENE) HIDDING

Minister for Infrastructure

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 December 2017
